dublinCore.dc:title: 89 HR 1061 IH: To make certain irrigation districts eligible for Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin Program pumping power, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Armstrong introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To make certain irrigation districts eligible for Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin Program pumping power, and for other purposes.

section.header: Eligibility of certain areas to receive Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin Program pumping power
section.text: Section 5(a) of Public Law 89–108 (79 Stat. 435; 100 Stat. 419; 114 Stat. 2763A–284) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.header: Eligibility of certain irrigation districts to receive pumping power

subparagraph.text: In this paragraph, the term eligible irrigation district means an irrigation district that is located in—

clause.text: the test area referred to in paragraph (1); or
an area within the 28,000-acre area described in paragraph (3) that is analyzed by the Secretary but not developed under that paragraph.

subparagraph.text: An eligible irrigation district shall be eligible to receive Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin Program pumping power—

clause.text: subject to any terms and at any rates established by the Secretary; and
in accordance with a contract entered into under subparagraph (C).
Subject to clause (ii), the Secretary may enter into a contract with an eligible irrigation district to provide Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin Program pumping power to the eligible irrigation district.

No Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin Program pumping power may be delivered to an eligible irrigation district under this paragraph until the date on which a contract authorizing the delivery to the irrigation district is executed under clause (i).
